docs.text: Welcome to my page News 2022/6/24 プレスリリース "アモルファス構造のトポロジーから熱伝導率を予測する技術を開発 −ミクロな構造と材料機能の相関解明に期待−" 分子研： https://www.ims.ac.jp/news/2022/06/220624.html JST： https://www.jst.go.jp/pr/announce/20220623/index.html 2022/5/23 Article: " Topologocal descriptor of thermal conductivity in amorphous Si " has been published in The Journal of Chemical Physics 2022/4/19 Article: " Relationship between local coordinates and thermal conductivity in amorphous carbon " has been published in Journal of Vacuum Science & Technology A 2022/1/14 Article: " First-principles calculations of phonon transport across a vacuum gap " has been published in Physical Review B 2021/9/2 Article: " Extreme near-field heat transfer between gold surfaces " has been published in Physical Review B 2021/8/16 Article: " Synergistic phonon scattering in epitaxial silicon multilayers with germanium nanodot inclusions " has been published in Physical Review B 2021/6/16 Article: " How mass disorder affects heat conduction in ternary amorphous alloys " has been published in AIP Advances 2021/5/14 Article: " Surface phonons limit heat conduction in thin films " has been published in Physical Review B 2021/3/15 Article: " Anisotropic thermal conductivitymeasurement of organic thin film withbidirectional 3ω method " has been published in Review of Scientific twisted graphene nanoribbons " has been published in Transactions of the JSME (in Japanese) 2019/11/27 Article: “ One-dimensional thermal transport in densely aligned single-wall carbon nanotube films ” has been published in Applied Physics Letters 2019/10/8 Article: “ Hybrid Thermal Transport Characteristics of Doped Organic Semiconductor Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):Tosylate ” has been published in The Journal of Physical Chemistry C 2019/9/16 Article: “ Enhancing Thermal Boundary Conductance of Graphite–Metal Interface by Triazine-Based Molecular Bonding ” has been published in ACS Applied Energy & Interfaces 2019/8/22 Article: “ Scalable Multi-nanostructured Silicon for Room-Temperature Thermoelectrics ” has been published in ACS Applied Energy Materials 2019/3/6 プレスリリース "原子３個分の直径しかない極細ナノワイヤーの精密多量合成を実現　〜「ナノ試験管」を用いた鋳造反応〜" 2019/3/6 Article " Isolation of Single-Wired Transition-Metal Monochalcogenides by Carbon Nanotubes " has been published in Nano Letters 2018/11/6 " has been published in Physical Review Applied 2018/8/31 Article " Molecular dynamics study on heat conduction in poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) " has been published in Japanese Journal of Applied conductivity is really small " has been published in Physical Review B 2018/4/18 Article " Superlubrication by phonon confinement " has been published in Physical Review B Rapid Communication 2018/1/25 Article " Ultimate Confinement of Phonon Propagation in Silicon Nanocrystalline Structure " has been published in Physical Review Letters 2017/12/18 Article " Phonon-interference resonance effects by nanoparticles embedded in a matrix " has been published in Physical Review B Rapid Communication 2017/10/11 Article " Thermal recfitication in restructured grapehene with locally modulated temperature dependence of thermal conductivity " has been published in Physical Review B 2017/8/1 プレスリリース " 内包物質を用いて単層カーボンナノチューブの熱伝導性を制御～カーボンナノチューブを用いた熱デバイスに新たな設計指針～ " 2017/7/31 Article " Modulation of thermal and thermoelectric transport in individual carbon nanotubes by fullerene encapsulation " has been published in Nature Materials 2017/5/17 Article " Designing nanostructures for interfacial phonon transport via Bayesian optimization " has been published in Physical Review X 2017/4/18 プレスリリース " 機械学習により熱流を制御するナノ構造物質の最適設計に成功 " 2017/4/7 Article " Effects of Defects on Thermoelectric From slowdown of longitudinal optical phonons to thermal conductivity minimum " has been published in Physical Review B 2016/6/24 Article " Effects of phonon interference through long range interatomic bonds on thermal interface conductance " has been published in Low Temperature Physics 2016/5/17 Article " Harmonic phonon theory for calculating thermal conductivity spectrum from first-principles dispersion relations " has been published in Applied Physics Letters Projects Thermal phonons in phononic crystals Role of surface phonons in nanomaterials Heat transfer in disordered materials Ballistic-diffusive phonon transport in carbon nanomaterials Electrical and thermal transport in carbon nanotube network

docs.text: Takuma Shiga (志賀 拓麿) Affiliation : National Metrology Institute of Japan (NMIJ), National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology (AIST) Link ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5103-7853 Google Scholar: https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=7pXWD3kAAAAJ&hl=ja&oi=ao KAKEN: https://nrid.nii.ac.jp/en/nrid/1000010730088/ researchmap: https://researchmap.jp/takumashiga/?lang=ja Professional Exprience Apr. 2022-Present : Senior Research Scientist, National Metrology Instutite of Japan, National Institte of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology May 2018-Mar. 2022 : Lecturer (full-time), Department of Mechanical Engineering, The University of Tokyo Oct. 2017-Mar. 2021 : PRESTO Researcher, Japan Science and Technology Agency (JST) Feb. 2014-May 2018 : Assitant Professor, Department of Mechanical Engineering, The University of Tokyo Apr. 2013-Jan. 2014 : JSPS Research Fellow PD Apr. 2012-Mar. 2013 : JSPS Research Fellow DC2 Education Doctor of Engineering : The University of Tokyo (2013) Master of Science : Tokyo University of Science (2010) Bachelor of Science : Tokyo Univerisyt of Science (2008) Awards Apr. 2021 : The Young Scientists' Award, Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan Sep. 2020 Award for Best Review Paper, Thermal phonon engineering by tailored nanostructures, The Japan Society of Applied Physics May 2016 Scientific Contribution Award of the Heat Transfer Society of Japan, The Heat Transfer Socienty of Japan Mar. 2013 Deen's Award, The University of Tokyo Aug. 2012 : Presentation Award, Thermoelectric Society of Japan Jun. 2011 : 2011 MRS Spring Meeting and Exhibit Best Poster Award Nominee, Material Research Society Jun. 2011 : Best Presentation Award, The Heat Transfer Society of Japan
